name: health
description: Represents BACnet Health information, which provides diagnostic information about the health status of a BACnet object or property, including timestamp, error details, and optional descriptive information.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The date and time when the health status was determined.

fields.name: result
fields.description: The error information indicating the health status or any problems detected.

fields.name: property
fields.description: Optional property identifier related to the health status.

fields.name: details
fields.description: Optional additional details describing the health status or issue.
